languages.text: "Слишком много раз я видел, как еретик перед приговором делает последний отчаянный и подлый ход. Крепись, торговка".
"Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."
languages.original_text: "Слишком много раз я видел, как еретик перед приговором делает последний отчаянный и подлый ход. Крепись, торговка".

traits.locale_text: "Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."
"Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."
"Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."
"Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."
"Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."
"Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."

languages.text: “异端分子意识到自己即将接受审判时，往往会耍卑鄙手段，我早就见怪不怪了。打起精神来，小贩。”
languages.original_text: "Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."

traits.locale_text: “异端分子意识到自己即将接受审判时，往往会耍卑鄙手段，我早就见怪不怪了。打起精神来，小贩。”

languages.text: «He visto demasiadas veces a un hereje recurrir a toda clase de actos inmundos antes de recibir su sentencia. Prepárese, mercachifle».
languages.original_text: "Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."

traits.locale_text: «He visto demasiadas veces a un hereje recurrir a toda clase de actos inmundos antes de recibir su sentencia. Prepárese, mercachifle».

languages.text: « J'ai trop souvent vu des hérétiques tenter des gestes désespérés suite à l'annonce de leur sentence. Préparez-vous. »
languages.original_text: "Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai trop souvent vu des hérétiques tenter des gestes désespérés suite à l'annonce de leur sentence. Préparez-vous. »

languages.text: 「異端者が処罰を受ける直前に、何か卑劣な行為に出るのを、これまで何度も見てきた。覚悟しておけ、行商人」
languages.original_text: "Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者が処罰を受ける直前に、何か卑劣な行為に出るのを、これまで何度も見てきた。覚悟しておけ、行商人」

languages.text: "Çok defa şahit oldum, kâfirler cezaları verilmeden hemen önce alçakça bir eyleme başvururlar. Kendini hazırla."
languages.original_text: "Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."

traits.locale_text: "Çok defa şahit oldum, kâfirler cezaları verilmeden hemen önce alçakça bir eyleme başvururlar. Kendini hazırla."

languages.text: "Viel zu oft habe ich Ketzer zu einem abgefeimten Mittel greifen sehen, kurz bevor ihre Strafe vollzogen wurde. Nehmt Euch zusammen, Händlerin."
languages.original_text: "Too many times have I watched heretics resort to some low act right before their sentence was delivered. Brace yourself, peddler."

traits.locale_text: "Viel zu oft habe ich Ketzer zu einem abgefeimten Mittel greifen sehen, kurz bevor ihre Strafe vollzogen wurde. Nehmt Euch zusammen, Händlerin."
